author: ben.mesnik
title: NFT pools for game asset swaps
description: NFTs are very illiquid; to exchange virtual items quickly, such as trading cards, you'll likely lose money and time in the process.
solution: NFT-FT pools create a market for instant NFT liquidity so you can easily and efficiently swap one gaming asset for another.
experience: We're two first cohort Plutus Pioneers and Haskell developers with a passion for NFTs and gaming
